alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:51PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Montgomery, southeastern San Jacinto, northwestern Liberty, southern Polk and northeastern Harris Counties through 330 PM CST... At 250 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plum Grove, or 7 miles south of Cleveland, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Livingston, Shepherd, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Coldspring, Plum Grove, Goodrich, North Cleveland, Lake Livingston State Park, West Livingston, Tarkington Prairie, Segno, Romayor and Rye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto
